   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_protected_message/1,
   36:          muc_deny_protected_room_access/1,
   37:          muc_allow_access_to_owner/1,
   38:          muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms/1,
   39:          muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms/1,
   40:          muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms/1,
   41:          range_archive_request/1,
   42:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   43:          limit_archive_request/1,
   44:          prefs_set_request/1,
   45:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   46:          pagination_first5/1,
   47:          pagination_last5/1,
   48:          pagination_before10/1,
   49:          pagination_after10/1,
   50:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   51:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   52:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   53:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   54:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   55:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   56:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   57:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   58:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   59:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   60:          archived/1,
   61:          strip_archived/1,
   62:          filter_forwarded/1,
   63:          policy_violation/1,
   64:          offline_message/1,
   65:          nostore_hint/1,
   66:          purge_single_message/1,
   67:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   68:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   69:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   70:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   71:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   72:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   73:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   74: 
   75: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   76: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   77: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   78: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   79: 
   80: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   81:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   82:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   83:     )).
   84: 
   85: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   86:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   87:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   88:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   89:     )).
   90: 
   91: -define(_assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   92:     [ct:pal("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   93:             [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   94:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   95:     )).
   96: 
   97: -record(rsm_in, {
   98:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   99:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
  100:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
  101:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  102:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
  103:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
  104:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
  105:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
  106:         simple = false :: boolean(),
  107:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
  108:         }).
  109: 
  110: -record(forwarded_message, {
  111:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  112:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  113:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  114:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     message_from   :: binary() | undefined,
  119:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  120:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined,
  121:     has_x_user_element :: boolean()
  122: }).
  123: 
  124: -record(result_iq, {
  125:     from            :: binary(),
  126:     to              :: binary(),
  127:     id              :: binary(),
  128:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  129:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  130:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  131:     query_id        :: binary() | not_supported,
  132:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  133: }).
  134: 
  135: -record(error_iq, {
  136:     id              :: binary(),
  137:     type            :: binary(),
  138:     error_type      :: binary(),
  139:     condition       :: binary(),
  140:     text            :: binary()
  141: }).
  142: 
  143: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  144:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  145:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  146:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  147: }).
  148: 
  149: 
  150: -record(mam_archive_respond, {
  151:           respond_messages,
  152:           respond_iq,
  153:           respond_fin
  154:          }).
  155: 
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: %% Suite configuration
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: 
  160: muc_host() ->
  161:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  162: 
  163: host() ->
  164:     <<"localhost">>.
  165: 
  166: configurations() ->
  167:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  168:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  169: 
  170: odbc_configs(true) ->
  171:     [odbc,
  172:      odbc_simple,
  173:      odbc_async_pool,
  174:      odbc_mnesia,
  175:      odbc_async_cache,
  176:      odbc_cache,
  177:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  178:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  179: odbc_configs(_) ->
  180:     [].
  181: 
  182: riak_configs(true) ->
  183:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  184: riak_configs(_) ->
  185:      [].
  186: 
  187: basic_group_names() ->
  188:     [
  189:     mam,
  190:     mam03,
  191:     mam04,
  192:     mam_purge,
  193:     muc,
  194:     muc03,
  195:     muc04,
  196:     muc_with_pm,
  197:     rsm,
  198:     rsm03,
  199:     rsm04,
  200:     with_rsm,
  201:     with_rsm03,
  202:     with_rsm04,
  203:     muc_rsm,
  204:     muc_rsm03,
  205:     muc_rsm04,
  206:     bootstrapped,
  207:     archived,
  208:     policy_violation,
  209:     nostore,
  210:     prefs_cases
  211:     ].
  212: 
  213: all() ->
  214:     Reasons =
  215:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  216:         false -> [require_odbc];
  217:         true  -> []
  218:     end,
  219:     case Reasons of
  220:         [] ->
  221:             tests();
  222:         [_|_] ->
  223:             {skip, Reasons}
  224:     end.
  225: 
  226: tests() ->
  227:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  228:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  229:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  230: 
  231: groups() ->
  232:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  233:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  234:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  235: 
  236: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  237:     false.
  238: 
  239: 
  240: basic_groups() ->
  241:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  242:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  243:      {mam03,            [], mam_cases()},
  244:      {mam04,            [], mam_cases()},
  245:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  246:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  247:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  248:      {nostore,          [], nostore_cases()},
  249:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  250:      {muc03,            [], muc_cases()},
  251:      {muc04,            [], muc_cases()},
  252:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  253:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  254:      {rsm03,            [], rsm_cases()},
  255:      {rsm04,            [], rsm_cases()},
  256:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  257:      {muc_rsm03,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  258:      {muc_rsm04,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  259:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  260:      {with_rsm03,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  261:      {with_rsm04,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  262:      {prefs_cases,      [], prefs_cases()}].
  263: 
  264: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  265:      [purge_old_single_message,
  266:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  267: 
  268: mam_cases() ->
  269:     [mam_service_discovery,
  270:      simple_archive_request,
  271:      range_archive_request,
  272:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  273:      limit_archive_request].
  274: 
  275: mam_purge_cases() ->
  276:     [purge_single_message,
  277:      purge_multiple_messages].
  278: 
  279: archived_cases() ->
  280:     [archived,
  281:      strip_archived,
  282:      filter_forwarded].
  283: 
  284: policy_violation_cases() ->
  285:     [policy_violation].
  286: 
  287: nostore_cases() ->
  288:     [offline_message,
  289:      nostore_hint].
  290: 
  291: muc_cases() ->
  292:     [muc_service_discovery,
  293:      muc_archive_request,
  294:      muc_archive_purge,
  295:      muc_multiple_devices,
  296:      muc_protected_message,
  297:      muc_deny_protected_room_access,
  298:      muc_allow_access_to_owner,
  299:      muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms,
  300:      muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms,
  301:      muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms,
  302:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  303:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  304:      ].
  305: 
  306: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  307:     rsm_cases().
  308: 
  309: with_rsm_cases() ->
  310:     rsm_cases().
  311: 
  312: rsm_cases() ->
  313:       [pagination_first5,
  314:        pagination_last5,
  315:        pagination_before10,
  316:        pagination_after10,
  317:        pagination_empty_rset,
  318:        %% Border cases
  319:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  320:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  321:        %% Simple cases
  322:        pagination_simple_before10,
  323:        %% opt_count cases
  324:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  325:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  326:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  327:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  328:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  329:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  330:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  331: 
  332: prefs_cases() ->
  333:     [prefs_set_request,
  334:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  335:      run_prefs_cases,
  336:      run_set_and_get_prefs_cases].
  337: 
  338: suite() ->
  339:     escalus:suite().
  340: 
  341: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  342:     disable_shaping(
  343:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  344:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  345: 
  346: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  347:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  348: 
  349: user_names() ->
  350:     [alice, bob, kate].
  351: 
  352: create_users(Config) ->
  353:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  354: 
  355: delete_users(Config) ->
  356:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  357:     Config.
  358: 
  359: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  360:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  361:     set_shaper({{maxrate, 100}, {maxrate, 10000000}, {maxrate, 10000000}}),
  362:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  363: 
  364: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  365:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  366:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  367:     Config.
  368: 
  369: get_shaper() ->
  370:     Mam = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]),
  371:     Norm = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}]),
  372:     Fast = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}]),
  373:     {Mam, Norm, Fast}.
  374: 
  375: set_shaper({Mam, Norm, Fast}) ->
  376:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, Mam]),
  377:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}, Norm]),
  378:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}, Fast]),
  379:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  380: 
  381: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  382:    C = configuration(Group),
  383:    B = basic_group(Group),
  384:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  385:         skip ->
  386:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  387:         Config0 ->
  388:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  389:                    [Group, C, B]),
  390:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  391:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  392:     end.
  393: 
  394: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  395:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  396:     case C of
  397:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  398:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  399:         _ ->
  400:             Config0
  401:     end.
  402: 
  403: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  404:     delete_users(Config),
  405:     C = configuration(Group),
  406:     B = basic_group(Group),
  407:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  408: 
  409: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  410:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  411: init_modules(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  412:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  413: init_modules(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  414:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  415: 
  416: init_modules(C, muc03, Config) ->
  417:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  418: init_modules(C, muc04, Config) ->
  419:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  420: 
  421: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  422:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  427:     Config;
  428: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  429:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  435:     Config;
  436: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  442:     Config;
  443: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  452:     Config;
  453: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  460:     Config;
  461: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  469:     Config;
  470: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  480:     Config;
  481: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  486:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  490:     Config;
  491: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  499:     Config;
  500: 
  501: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  505:     Config;
  506: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  507:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  512:     Config;
  513: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  517:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  518:     Config;
  519: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  524:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  525:     Config;
  526: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  530:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  531:     Config;
  532: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  537:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  538:     Config;
  539: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  545:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  546:     Config;
  547: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  548:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  549:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  550:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  551:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  552:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  553:     Config;
  554: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  555:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  556:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  557:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  558:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  559:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  560:     Config;
  561: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  562:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  563:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  564:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  565:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  566:     Config;
  567: init_modules(odbc_simple, _, Config) ->
  568:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  569:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  570:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  571:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  572:     Config;
  573: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  574:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  575:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  576:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  577:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  578:     Config;
  579: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  580:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  581:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  582:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), % 1ms
  583:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  584:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  585:     Config;
  586: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  587:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  588:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  589:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  590:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  591:     Config;
  592: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  593:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  594:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  595:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  596:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  597:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  598:     Config;
  599: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  600:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  601:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  602:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  603:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  604:     Config;
  605: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  606:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  607:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  608:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  609:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  610:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  611:     Config;
  612: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  613:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  614:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  615:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  616:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  617:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  618:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  619:     Config;
  620: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  621:     skip;
  622: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  623:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  624:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  625:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  626:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  627:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  628:     Config.
  629: 
  630: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  631:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  632:     Config.
  633: 
  634: mam_modules() ->
  635:     [mod_mam,
  636:      mod_mam_muc,
  637:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  638:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  639:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  640:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  641:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  642:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  643:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  644:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  645:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  646:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  647:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  648:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  649:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  650:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  651: 
  652: init_state(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  653:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  654:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  655: init_state(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  656:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  657:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  658: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  659:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  660:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  661:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  662:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  663: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  664:     Config;
  665: init_state(_, muc03, Config) ->
  666:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  667: init_state(_, muc04, Config) ->
  668:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  669: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  670:     Config;
  671: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  672:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  673: init_state(_, rsm03, Config) ->
  674:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  675:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  676: init_state(_, rsm04, Config) ->
  677:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  678:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  679: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  680:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  681:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  682: init_state(_, with_rsm03, Config) ->
  683:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  684:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  685: init_state(_, with_rsm04, Config) ->
  686:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  687:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  688: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  689:     clean_archives(Config);
  690: init_state(_, mam03, Config) ->
  691:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  692:     clean_archives(Config1);
  693: init_state(_, mam04, Config) ->
  694:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  695:     clean_archives(Config1);
  696: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  697:     clean_archives(Config).
  698: 
  699: mam03_props() ->
  700:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  701:      {final_message, true},             %% expect final message with <fin/> inside
  702:      {result_format, mess_fin},         %% RSM is inside final message
  703:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v03()}].    %% v0.3 namespace
  704: 
  705: mam04_props() ->
  706:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  707:      {result_format, iq_fin},           %% RSM is inside iq with <fin/> inside
  708:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v04()}].
  709: 
  710: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  711:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  712:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  713:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  714:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  715:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  716:                                        ],
  717:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  718:                  _ ->
  719:                      ConfigIn
  720:              end,
  721:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  722: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  723:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  724: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  725:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  726: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  727:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  728: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  729:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  730: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  731:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  732:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  733: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  734:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  735:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  736: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  737:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  738:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  739: init_per_testcase(C=nostore_hint, Config) ->
  740:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config); %% skip bootstrap & clean to safe time
  741: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  742:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  743:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  744: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  745:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  746:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  747: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  748:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  749: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  750:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  751: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  752:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  753: init_per_testcase(C=muc_protected_message, Config) ->
  754:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  755: init_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_protected_room_access, Config) ->
  756:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_protected_room(Config));
  757: init_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  758:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_protected_room(Config));
  759: init_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  760:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  761: init_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  762:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  763: init_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  764:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  765: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  766:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  767:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  768: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  769:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  770: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  771:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  772: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  773:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  774: 
  775: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  776:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  777:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  778:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  779:         _ ->
  780:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  781:     end.
  782: 
  783: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  784:     destroy_room(Config),
  785:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  786: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  787:     destroy_room(Config),
  788:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  789: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  790:     destroy_room(Config),
  791:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  792: end_per_testcase(C=muc_protected_message, Config) ->
  793:     destroy_room(Config),
  794:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  795: end_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_protected_room_access, Config) ->
  796:     destroy_room(Config),
  797:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  798: end_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  799:     destroy_room(Config),
  800:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  801: end_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  802:     destroy_room(Config),
  803:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  804: end_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  805:     destroy_room(Config),
  806:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  807: end_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  808:     destroy_room(Config),
  809:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  810: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  811:     destroy_room(Config),
  812:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  813: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  814:     destroy_room(Config),
  815:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  816: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  817:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  818: 
  819: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  820:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  821:     orelse
  822:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  823:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  824:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  825: 
  826: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  827:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  828: 
  829: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  830:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  831: 
  832: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  833:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  834:         non_existing -> ok;
  835:         false        -> ok;
  836:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  837:     end.
  838: 
  839: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  840:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  841:     ok.
  842: 
  843: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  844:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  845:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  846:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  847:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  848:     Result ->
  849:         Result
  850:     end.
  851: 
  852: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  853:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  854:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  855:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  856: 
  857: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  858: %% Group name helpers
  859: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  860: 
  861: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  862:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  863: 
  864: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  865: configuration(Group) ->
  866:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  867: 
  868: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  869: %% will be tested.
  870: %%
  871: %% Example:
  872: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  873: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  874: %% @end
  875: make_greedy(List) ->
  876:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  877: 
  878: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  879: basic_group(Group) ->
  880:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  881: 
  882: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  883:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  884:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  885:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  886: 
  887: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  888:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  889: 
  890: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  891:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  892:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  893:         true -> PrefixA;
  894:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  895:     end.
  896: 
  897: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  898:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  899: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  900:     Target.
  901: 
  902: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  903:     Tail.
  904: 
  905: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  906: %% Adhoc tests
  907: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  908: 
  909: %% Querying the archive for messages
  910: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  911:     P = ?config(props, ConfigIn),
  912:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  913:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  914:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  915:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  916:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  917:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  918:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  919:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  920:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  921:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  922:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  923:         Res = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  924:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, Res),
  925:         assert_respond_query_id(P, <<"q1">>, parse_result_iq(P, Res)),
  926:         ok
  927:         end,
  928:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  929:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  930:                       ],
  931:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  932:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  933: 
  934: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  935:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  936:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  937:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  938:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  939: 
  940:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  941: 
  942:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  943:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID)),
  944:         assert_respond_size(P, CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  945:         ok
  946:         end,
  947:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  948: 
  949: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  950:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  951:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  952:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  953:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  954: 
  955:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  956: 
  957:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(P, <<>>),
  958:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  959:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  960:         assert_respond_size(P, MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  961: 
  962:         ok
  963:         end,
  964:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  965: 
  966: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  967:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  968:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  969:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  970:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  971: 
  972:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  973:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  974:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  975: 
  976:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID),
  977:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  978:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  979: 
  980:         assert_respond_size(P, Len, Result),
  981:         ok
  982:         end,
  983:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  984: 
  985: archived(Config) ->
  986:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  987:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  988:         %% Archive must be empty.
  989:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  990:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  991: 
  992:         %% Bob receives a message.
  993:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  994:         try
  995:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  996:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  997:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  998:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  999:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1000: 
 1001:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
 1002: 
 1003:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1004:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1005:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1006:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1007:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1008:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
 1009:         ok
 1010:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1011:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1012:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1013:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1014:         end
 1015:         end,
 1016:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1017: 
 1018: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
 1019:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1020:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1021:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1022:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1023: 
 1024:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1025:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1026:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1027:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1028:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1029: 
 1030:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
 1031:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1032:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1033:         ok
 1034:         end,
 1035:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1036: 
 1037: strip_archived(Config) ->
 1038:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1039:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1040:         %% Archive must be empty.
 1041:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1042:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1043:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
 1044:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1045:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
 1046: 
 1047:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1048:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1049:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1050:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1051:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1052:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1053:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1054: 
 1055:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
 1056: 
 1057:         try
 1058:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1059:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1060:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1061:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1062:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1063:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1064:         ok
 1065:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1066:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1067:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1068:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1069:         end
 1070:         end,
 1071:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1072: 
 1073: respond_messages(#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1074:     Messages.
 1075: 
 1076: respond_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ}) ->
 1077:     IQ.
 1078: 
 1079: get_prop(Key, undefined) ->
 1080:     get_prop(Key, []);
 1081: get_prop(final_message, P) ->
 1082:     proplists:get_bool(final_message, P);
 1083: get_prop(result_format, P) ->
 1084:     proplists:get_value(result_format, P, iq_query);
 1085: get_prop(mam_ns, P) ->
 1086:     proplists:get_value(mam_ns, P, mam_ns_binary());
 1087: get_prop(data_form, P) ->
 1088:     proplists:get_bool(data_form, P).
 1089: 
 1090: wait_archive_respond(P, User) ->
 1091:     case get_prop(final_message, P) of
 1092:         true ->
 1093:             wait_archive_respond_fin(User);
 1094:         false ->
 1095:             wait_archive_respond_nofin(User)
 1096:     end.
 1097: 
 1098: wait_archive_respond_fin(User) ->
 1099:     %% rot1
 1100:     [IQ|MessagesAndFin] = wait_archive_respond_v03(User),
 1101:     [Fin|Messages] = lists:reverse(MessagesAndFin),
 1102:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1103:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1104:        respond_fin=Fin,
 1105:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1106: 
 1107: wait_archive_respond_nofin(User) ->
 1108:     %% rot1
 1109:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond_v02(User)),
 1110:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1111:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1112:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1113: 
 1114: %% MAM v0.2 respond
 1115: wait_archive_respond_v02(User) ->
 1116:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1117:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
 1118:         true ->
 1119:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
 1120:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1121:         false -> ok
 1122:     end,
 1123:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
 1124:         true  -> [S];
 1125:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond_v02(User)]
 1126:     end.
 1127: 
 1128: %% MAM v0.3 respond
 1129: wait_archive_respond_v03(User) ->
 1130:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1131:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(IQ) of
 1132:         true ->
 1133:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [IQ]),
 1134:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1135:         false -> ok
 1136:     end,
 1137:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1138:     [IQ|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)].
 1139: 
 1140: wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User) ->
 1141:     M = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1142:     escalus:assert(is_message, M),
 1143:     case is_final_message(M) of
 1144:         true ->
 1145:             [M];
 1146:         false ->
 1147:             [M|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)]
 1148:     end.
 1149: 
 1150: is_final_message(M) ->
 1151:     undefined =/= exml_query:subelement(M, <<"fin">>).
 1152: 
 1153: assert_respond_size(P, Size, Respond=#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages})
 1154:       when length(Messages) =:= Size ->
 1155:     Respond;
 1156: assert_respond_size(P, ExpectedSize, #mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1157:     RespondSize = length(Messages) - 1,
 1158:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
 1159:     %% void()
 1160: 
 1161: assert_respond_query_id(_P, _ExpectedQueryId, #result_iq{query_id=not_supported}) ->
 1162:     ok;
 1163: assert_respond_query_id(_P, ExpectedQueryId, #result_iq{query_id=QueryId}) ->
 1164:     ?assert_equal(ExpectedQueryId, QueryId).
 1165: 
 1166: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
 1167: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
 1168: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
 1169: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
 1170: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
 1171: policy_violation(Config) ->
 1172:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1173:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1174:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1175:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
 1176:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 1177:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1178:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
 1179:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
 1180:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
 1181:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1182:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
 1183:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"will_fail">>)),
 1184:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1185:         try
 1186:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1187:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1188:             ok
 1189:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1190:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1191:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1192:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1193:         end
 1194:         end,
 1195:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1196: 
 1197: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1198: offline_message(Config) ->
 1199:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1200:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1201:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1202:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1203:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1204:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1205:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1206:         ok
 1207:         end,
 1208:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1209: 
 1210:     %% Bob logs in
 1211:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1212: 
 1213:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1214:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1215: 
 1216:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1217:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1218: 
 1219:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1220:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1221:     ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1222:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1223: 
 1224:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1225: 
 1226: nostore_hint(Config) ->
 1227:     Msg = <<"So secret">>,
 1228:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1229:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1230:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob with a hint.
 1231:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1232:                      add_nostore_hint(escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg))),
 1233:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1234:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 1000),
 1235: 
 1236:         %% Bob checks his archive.
 1237:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1238:         ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1239:         assert_not_stored(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1240:         ok
 1241:         end,
 1242:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1243: 
 1244: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1245:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1246:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1247:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1248:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1249:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1250:             [Mess] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1251:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1252:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1253:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1254:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1255:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1256:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1257:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1258:             ok
 1259:         end,
 1260:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1261: 
 1262: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1263:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1264:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1265:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1266:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1267:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1268:             AllMessages = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize,
 1269:                 wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1270:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1271:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1272:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1273:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1274:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1275:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1276:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1277:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1278:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1279:             assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1280:             ok
 1281:         end,
 1282:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1283: 
 1284: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1285:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1286:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1287:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1288:             [begin
 1289:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1290:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1291:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1292:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1293:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1294:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1295:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1296:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1297:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1298:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1299:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1300:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1301:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1302:             ok
 1303:         end,
 1304:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1305: 
 1306: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1307:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1308:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1309:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1310:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1311:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1312:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1313:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1314: 
 1315:         %% Bob received presences.
 1316:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1317: 
 1318:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1319:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1320: 
 1321:         %% Alice sends another message to Bob.
 1322:         %% The message is not archived by the room.
 1323:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1324:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1325: 
 1326:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1327: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1328: 
 1329:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1330:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1331:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1332:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1333:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1334:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1335:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1336:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1337:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1338:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1339: 
 1340:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1341: 
 1342:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1343:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1344:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1345:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody,
 1346:                            message_to=MsgTo, message_from=MsgFrom} =
 1347:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1348:         %% XEP: the 'to' of the forwarded stanza MUST be empty
 1349:         ?assert_equal_extra(<<>>, MsgTo, message_to),
 1350:         %% XEP: the 'from' MUST be the occupant JID of the sender of the archived message
 1351:         ?assert_equal_extra(room_address(Room, nick(Alice)), MsgFrom, message_from),
 1352: 
 1353:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1354:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1355:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1356:         ?assert_equal_extra(true, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1357:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1358:         ok
 1359:         end,
 1360:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1361: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1362: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1363:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1364:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1365:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1366:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1367:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1368:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1369:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1370: 
 1371:         %% Bob received presences.
 1372:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1373: 
 1374:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1375:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1376: 
 1377:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1378:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1379: 
 1380:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1381:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1382:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1383:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1384:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1385:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1386:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1387:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1388:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1389:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1390:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1391:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1392:         ok
 1393:     end,
 1394:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1395: 
 1396: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1397:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1398:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1399:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1400:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1401:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1402:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1403:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1404:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1405:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1406: 
 1407:         %% Alice received presences.
 1408:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1409:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1410: 
 1411:         %% Bob received presences.
 1412:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1413: 
 1414:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1415:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1416: 
 1417:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1418:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1419:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1420: 
 1421:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1422: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1423: 
 1424:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1425:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1426:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1427: 
 1428:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1429:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1430: 
 1431:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1432:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1433:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1434: 
 1435:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1436:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1437:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1438:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1439:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1440:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1441:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1442:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1443:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1444:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1445: 
 1446:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1447: 
 1448:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1449: 
 1450:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1451: 
 1452:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1453:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1454:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1455:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1456:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1457:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1458:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1459:         ok
 1460:         end,
 1461:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1462: 
 1463: muc_protected_message(Config) ->
 1464:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1465:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1466:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1467:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1468:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1469:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1470: 
 1471:         %% Bob received presences.
 1472:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1473: 
 1474:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1475:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1476: 
 1477:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1478:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1479:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1480:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1481: 
 1482:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1483:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1484:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1485: 
 1486:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1487:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1488:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1489:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1490:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1491:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1492: 
 1493:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1494:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1495:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1496:         ok
 1497:         end,
 1498:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1499: 
 1500: muc_deny_protected_room_access(Config) ->
 1501:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1502:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1503:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1504:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1505:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1506:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1507:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1508: 
 1509:         %% mod_muc returns error presence.
 1510:         Err1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1511:         escalus_assert:is_error(Err1, <<"auth">>, <<"not-authorized">>),
 1512: 
 1513:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1514: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1515: 
 1516:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1517:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1518:         Err2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1519:         %% mod_mam_muc returns error iq.
 1520:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Err2),
 1521:         ok
 1522:         end,
 1523:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1524: 
 1525: %% @doc Allow access to non-in-room users who able to connect
 1526: muc_allow_access_to_owner(Config) ->
 1527:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1528:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1529:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1530:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1531: 
 1532:         %% Alice (not in room) requests the room's archive.
 1533:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1534:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1535:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1536:         ok
 1537:         end,
 1538:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1539: 
 1540: muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms(Config) ->
 1541:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1542:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1543:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1544:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1545:         Text = <<"Hi all!">>,
 1546:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1547:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1548: 
 1549:         %% Bob received presences.
 1550:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1551: 
 1552:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1553:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1554: 
 1555:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1556: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1557: 
 1558:         %% Bob receives the message.
 1559:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1560: 
 1561:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1562: 
 1563:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1564:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1565: 
 1566:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1567:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1568: 
 1569:         ?assert_equal_extra(false, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1570:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1571:         ok
 1572:         end,
 1573:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1574:

 1638:

 1640:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1641:         ok

 1644: 
 1645: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1646: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1647:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1648:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1649:         %% Send
 1650:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1651:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1652:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1653:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1654:         %%   </query>
 1655:         %% </iq>
 1656:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request(P)),
 1657:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1658:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1659:         ok
 1660:         end,
 1661:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1662: 
 1663: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1664:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1665:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1666:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1667:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1668:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1669:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1670:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1671:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1672:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1673:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1674:         %% Send
 1675:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1676:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1677:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1678:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1679:         %%   </query>
 1680:         %% </iq>
 1681:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, StartTime, StopTime)),
 1682:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1683:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1684:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1685:         [M1,M2|_] = respond_messages(Result),
 1686:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1687:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1688:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1689:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1690:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1691:         ok
 1692:         end,
 1693:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1694: 
 1695: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1696:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1697:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1698:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1699:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1700: 
 1701: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1702: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1703: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1704:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1705:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1706:         %% Send
 1707:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1708:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1709:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1710:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1711:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1712:         %%       </set>
 1713:         %%   </query>
 1714:         %% </iq>
 1715:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request(P)),
 1716:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1717:         Msgs = respond_messages(Result),
 1718:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1719:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1720:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1721:         ok
 1722:         end,
 1723:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1724: 
 1725: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1726:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1727:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1728:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1729:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1730: 
 1731:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1732:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1733:         wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, 15)
 1734:         end,
 1735:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1736: 
 1737: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1738:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1739:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1740:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1741:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1742:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1743:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1744:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1745:         ok
 1746:         end,
 1747:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1748:

 1773: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1774:     P = ?config(props, Config),

 1776:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1779:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5">>, RSM)),

 1781:         ok
 1782:         end,

 1809: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1810:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1811:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1812:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1813:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1814:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1815:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1816:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 10),
 1817:         ok
 1818:         end,
 1819:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1820: 
 1821: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1822:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1823:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1824:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1825:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1826:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1827:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1828:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 15),
 1829:         ok
 1830:         end,
 1831:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1832: 
 1833: 
 1834: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1835:     P = ?config(props, Config),

 1837:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1839:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1840:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1841:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 5, 9),
 1842:         ok
 1843:         end,
 1844:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1845: 
 1846: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1847:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1848:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1849:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1851:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1852:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1853:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1854:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1855:         ok
 1856:         end,

 1858: 
 1859: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1860:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1861:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1862:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1863:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1864:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1865:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"after10">>, RSM)),

 1867:         ok
 1868:         end,
