 1870: 
 1871: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1872: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1873: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1874:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1875:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1876:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1877:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1878:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1879:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1880:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1881:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1882:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1883:         ok
 1884:         end,
 1885:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1886: 
 1887: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1888: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1889:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1890:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1891:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1892:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1893:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1894:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1895:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1896:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1897:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1898:         ok
 1899:         end,
 1900:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1901: 
 1902: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1903:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1904: 
 1905: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1906:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1907:         true ->
 1908:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1909:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1910:         _ ->
 1911:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1912:     end.
 1913: 
 1914: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1915:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1916:         true ->
 1917:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1918:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1919:         _ ->
 1920:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1921:     end.
 1922: 
 1923: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1924:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1925:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1926:         %% Send
 1927:         %%
 1928:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1929:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1930:         %%     <always>
 1931:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1932:         %%     </always>
 1933:         %%     <never>
 1934:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1935:         %%     </never>
 1936:         %%   </prefs>
 1937:         %% </iq>
 1938:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1939:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1940:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1941:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1942: 
 1943:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1944:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1945: 
 1946:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1947:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1948:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1949:         ok
 1950:         end,
 1951:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1952: 
 1953: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1954: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1955: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1956: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1957: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1958:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1959:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1960:         %% Send
 1961:         %%
 1962:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1963:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1964:         %%     <always>
 1965:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1966:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1967:         %%     </always>
 1968:         %%   </prefs>
 1969:         %% </iq>
 1970:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1971:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1972:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1973:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1974:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1975: 
 1976:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1977:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1978: 
 1979:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1980:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1981:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1982:         ok
 1983:         end,
 1984:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1985: 
 1986: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1987:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1988:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1989:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1990:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1991:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1992:         try
 1993:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1994:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1995:         ok
 1996:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1997:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1998:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1999:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2000:         end
 2001:         end,
 2002:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2003: 
 2004: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 2005: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 2006:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2007:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2008:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 2009:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 2010:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 2011:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2012:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 2013:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 2014:         ok
 2015:         end,
 2016:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2017: 
 2018: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2019: %% Helpers
 2020: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2021: 
 2022: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 2023: 
 2024: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 2025: mam_ns_binary_v03() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:0">>.
 2026: mam_ns_binary_v04() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:1">>.
 2027: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 2028: 
 2029: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 2030:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2031:        name = <<"purge">>,
 2032:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 2033:     }]).
 2034: 
 2035: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 2036:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2037:        name = <<"purge">>,
 2038:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 2039:        children = skip_undefined([
 2040:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2041:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2042:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 2043:     }]).
 2044: 
 2045: 
 2046: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 2047:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 2048: 
 2049: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 2050:     [];
 2051: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 2052:     [{K, V}].
 2053: 
 2054: mam_ns_attr(P) ->
 2055:     [{<<"xmlns">>,get_prop(mam_ns, P)}].
 2056: 
 2057: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 2058:     undefined;
 2059: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 2060:     #xmlel{
 2061:         name = <<"start">>,
 2062:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 2063: 
 2064: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 2065:     undefined;
 2066: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 2067:     #xmlel{
 2068:         name = <<"end">>,
 2069:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 2070: 
 2071: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 2072:     undefined;
 2073: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 2074:     #xmlel{
 2075:         name = <<"with">>,
 2076:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 2077: 
 2078: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 2079: %% a certain query.
 2080: stanza_archive_request(P, QueryId) ->
 2081:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId,
 2082:                               undefined, undefined,
 2083:                               undefined, undefined).
 2084: 
 2085: stanza_date_range_archive_request(P) ->
 2086:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2087:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 2088:                               undefined, undefined).
 2089: 
 2090: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, Start, Stop) ->
 2091:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2092:                               Start, Stop,
 2093:                               undefined, undefined).
 2094: 
 2095: stanza_limit_archive_request(P) ->
 2096:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 2097:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 2098: 
 2099: stanza_page_archive_request(P, QueryId, RSM) ->
 2100:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 2101: 
 2102: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID) ->
 2103:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, undefined,
 2104:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 2105: 
 2106: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2107:     case get_prop(data_form, P) of
 2108:         false ->
 2109:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM);
 2110:         true ->
 2111:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM)
 2112:     end.
 2113: 
 2114: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2115:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2116:        name = <<"query">>,
 2117:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2118:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId),
 2119:        children = skip_undefined([
 2120:            form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM),
 2121:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2122:     }]).
 2123: 
 2124: 
 2125: form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2126:     #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2127:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:data">>}],
 2128:            children = skip_undefined([
 2129:                 form_field(<<"start">>, BStart),
 2130:                 form_field(<<"end">>, BEnd),
 2131:                 form_field(<<"with">>, BWithJID)]
 2132:                 ++ form_extra_fields(RSM)
 2133:                 ++ form_border_fields(RSM))}.
 2134: 
 2135: form_extra_fields(undefined) ->
 2136:     [];
 2137: form_extra_fields(#rsm_in{simple=Simple, opt_count=OptCount}) ->
 2138:     [form_bool_field(<<"simple">>, Simple),
 2139:      form_bool_field(<<"opt_count">>, OptCount)].
 2140: 
 2141: form_border_fields(undefined) ->
 2142:     [];
 2143: form_border_fields(#rsm_in{
 2144:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2145:     [form_field(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId),
 2146:      form_field(<<"after_id">>, AfterId),
 2147:      form_field(<<"from_id">>, FromId),
 2148:      form_field(<<"to_id">>, ToId)].
 2149: 
 2150: form_type_field(MamNs) ->
 2151:     form_field(<<"FORM_TYPE">>, MamNs).
 2152: 
 2153: form_field(VarName, undefined) ->
 2154:     undefined;
 2155: form_field(VarName, VarValue) ->
 2156:     #xmlel{name = <<"field">>, attrs = [{<<"var">>, VarName}],
 2157:            children = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 2158:                               children = [#xmlcdata{content = VarValue}]}]}.
 2159: 
 2160: form_bool_field(Name, true) ->
 2161:     form_field(Name, <<"true">>);
 2162: form_bool_field(Name, _) ->
 2163:     undefined.
 2164: 
 2165: 
 2166: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2167:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2168:        name = <<"query">>,
 2169:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2170:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 2171:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 2172:        children = skip_undefined([
 2173:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 2174:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 2175:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2176:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2177:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 2178:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2179:     }]).
 2180: 
 2181: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 2182:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 2183: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 2184:     [].
 2185: 
 2186: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 2187:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 2188: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 2189:     [].
 2190: 
 2191: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 2192:     [];
 2193: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 2194:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2195:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 2196:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 2197:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 2198:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 2199: 
 2200: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 2201:     undefined;
 2202: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 2203:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 2204:            children = skip_undefined([
 2205:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 2206:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 2207:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 2208: 
 2209: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 2210: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 2211: 
 2212: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 2213:     undefined;
 2214: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 2215:     #xmlel{
 2216:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 2217:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 2218: 
 2219: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 2220:     undefined;
 2221: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 2222:     #xmlel{
 2223:         name = <<"index">>,
 2224:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 2225: 
 2226: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 2227:     undefined;
 2228: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 2229:     #xmlel{
 2230:         name = <<"max">>,
 2231:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 2232: 
 2233: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 2234:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 2235:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 2236:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 2237:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 2238: 
 2239: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 2240:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2241:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2242:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 2243: 
 2244: assert_not_stored(Archived, Sent) ->
 2245:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2246:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2247:     ?assert_equal(0, erlang:length(Same)).
 2248: 
 2249: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 2250:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 2251:     A =:= Raw.
 2252: 
 2253: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2254: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 2255: 
 2256: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 2257:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2258:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 2259:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2260:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 2261:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2262:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2263:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2264:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 2265:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 2266:     }]).
 2267: 
 2268: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 2269:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2270:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2271:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2272:     }]).
 2273: 
 2274: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 2275: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 2276:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 2277: 
 2278: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 2279:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 2280: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 2281:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 2282:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 2283: 
 2284: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2285: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 2286: 
 2287: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2288:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2289:     M = #forwarded_message{
 2290:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2291:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2292:         has_x_user_element = false},
 2293:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 2294: 
 2295: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 2296:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 2297:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 2298:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2299:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 2300:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2301:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 2302: 
 2303: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 2304:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 2305:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 2306: 
 2307: 
 2308: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 2309:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2310:     M#forwarded_message{
 2311:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2312:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 2313: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2314:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 2315:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 2316:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2317:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2318:         message_from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2319:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2320:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 2321:                 M1, Children).
 2322: 
 2323: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 2324:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 2325:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 2326: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2327:         attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2328:     IsUser = lists:member({<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#user">>}, Attrs),
 2329:     M#forwarded_message{has_x_user_element = IsUser};
 2330: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 2331: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 2332:     M.
 2333: 
 2334: %% Num is 1-based.
 2335: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 2336:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 2337:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 2338:     Id.
 2339: 
 2340: 
 2341: %% @doc Result query iq.
 2342: %%
 2343: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2344: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2345: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2346: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 2347: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2348: %%     []}]
 2349: %%
 2350: %%
 2351: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2352: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2353: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2354: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 2355: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2356: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 2357: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 2358: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 2359: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 2360: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 2361: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 2362: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 2363: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 2364: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 2365: parse_result_iq(P, Result) ->
 2366:     case get_prop(result_format, P) of
 2367:         mess_fin ->
 2368:             parse_fin_and_iq(Result);
 2369:         iq_query ->
 2370:             parse_legacy_iq(respond_iq(Result));
 2371:         iq_fin ->
 2372:             parse_fin_iq(Result)
 2373:     end.
 2374: 
 2375: %% MAM v0.3
 2376: parse_fin_and_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=FinMsg}) ->
 2377:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(FinMsg, <<"fin">>),
 2378:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2379:     QueryId = exml_query:attr(Fin, <<"queryid">>),
 2380:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, QueryId).
 2381: 
 2382: %% MAM v0.4
 2383: parse_fin_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=undefined}) ->
 2384:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"fin">>),
 2385:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2386:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, not_supported).
 2387: 
 2388: %% MAM v0.2
 2389: parse_legacy_iq(IQ) ->
 2390:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"query">>),
 2391:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2392:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, not_supported).
 2393: 
 2394: parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, QueryId) ->
 2395:     #result_iq{
 2396:         query_id    = QueryId,
 2397:         from        = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"from">>),
 2398:         to          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"to">>),
 2399:         id          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"id">>),
 2400:         first       = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 2401:         first_index = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, {attr, <<"index">>}])),
 2402:         last        = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 2403:         count       = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]))}.
 2404: 
 2405: 
 2406: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 2407: 
 2408: 
 2409: 
 2410: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 2411:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 2412:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2413: 
 2414: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 2415:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 2416:                            IQ) ->
 2417:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 2418:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 2419:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 2420: 
 2421: 
 2422: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2423:                                         children = Children},
 2424:                                  IQ) ->
 2425:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 2426: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2427:                                         children = Children},
 2428:                                  IQ) ->
 2429:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 2430: 
 2431: 
 2432: parse_jids(Els) ->
 2433:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 2434:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 2435: 
 2436: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 2437: %%   <error type='modify'>
 2438: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 2439: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 2440: %%   </error>
 2441: %% </iq>
 2442: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 2443:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2444: 
 2445:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2446:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2447:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2448:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2449: 
 2450: 
 2451: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2452:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2453:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2454:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2455:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2456: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2457:     IQ.
 2458: 
 2459: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2460:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2461:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2462: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2463:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2464: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2465:     IQ.
 2466: 
 2467: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2468: %% Helpers (muc)
 2469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2470: 
 2471: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2472:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2473:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2474:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2475:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2476:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2477: 
 2478: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2479:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2480:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2481:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2482:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2483:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, false}]).
 2484: 
 2485: start_alice_protected_room(Config) ->
 2486:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2487:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2488:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2489:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
 2490:                [{persistent, true},
 2491:                 {password_protected, true},
 2492:                 {password, <<"secret">>}]).
 2493: 
 2494: start_alice_anonymous_room(Config) ->
 2495:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2496:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2497:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2498:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{anonymous, true}]).
 2499: 
 2500: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2501:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2502:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2503:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2504:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2505: 
 2506: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2507:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2508:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2509:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2510:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2511:         _ -> ok
 2512:     end.
 2513: 
 2514: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2515:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2516:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2517:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2518:                    Room, Nick).
 2519: 
 2520: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2521:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2522: 
 2523: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2524:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2525: 
 2526: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2527:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2528: 
 2529: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2530:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2531: 
 2532: 
 2533: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2534:     Pid = self(),
 2535:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2536:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2537:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2538:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2539:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2540:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2541: 
 2542:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2543:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2544: 
 2545:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2546:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2547:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2548:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2549:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2550:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2551:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2552: 
 2553:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2554: 
 2555:         %% Get whole history.
 2556:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2557:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2558:         AllMessages =
 2559:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2560:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2561:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2562:         ok
 2563:         end,
 2564:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2565:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2566:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2567:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2568: 
 2569:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2570:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2571: 
 2572: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2573:     Pid = self(),
 2574:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2575:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2576:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2577:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2578:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2579:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2580:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2581:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2582:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2583:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2584:         %% Get whole history.
 2585:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_messages">>)),
 2586:         AllMessages =
 2587:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2588:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2589:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2590:         ok
 2591:         end,
 2592:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2593:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2594:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2595:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2596: 
 2597:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2598:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2599: 
 2600: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2601:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2602: 
 2603: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2604:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2605:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2606: 
 2607: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2608:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2609:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2610:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2611:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2612:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2613:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U, 10) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2614:     Config.
 2615: 
 2616: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2617:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2618:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2619:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2620:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room, 10),
 2621:     Config.
 2622: 
 2623: serv_users(Config) ->
 2624:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2625:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2626: 
 2627: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2628:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2629:     {Server, Username}.
 2630: 
 2631: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2632: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) when is_integer(RetryTimes) -> 
 2633:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2634:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2635:        0 -> ok;
 2636:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2637:     end.
 2638: 
 2639: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2640:     archive_size(Server, Username);
 2641: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2642:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2643:         ExpectedSize ->
 2644:             ExpectedSize;
 2645:         _ActualSize ->
 2646:             %% Wait and retry
 2647:             timer:sleep(100),
 2648:             wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2649:     end.
 2650: 
 2651: wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) ->
 2652:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) of
 2653:         ExpectedSize -> ok;
 2654:         ActualSize ->
 2655:             ct:pal("issue=wait_for_archive_size_or_warning, expected_size=~p, actual_size=~p",
 2656:                    [ExpectedSize, ActualSize])
 2657:     end.
 2658: 
 2659: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2660: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) ->
 2661:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2662:     case wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2663:        0 -> ok;
 2664:        X -> ct:fail({room_not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2665:     end.
 2666: 
 2667: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2668:     room_archive_size(Server, Username);
 2669: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2670:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2671:         ExpectedSize ->
 2672:             ExpectedSize;
 2673:         _ActualSize ->
 2674:             %% Wait and retry
 2675:             timer:sleep(100),
 2676:             wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2677:     end.
 2678: 
 2679: 
 2680: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2681:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2682: 
 2683: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2684:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2685: 
 2686: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2687:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2688: 
 2689: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2690:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2691: 
 2692: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2693:     %% Do not care
 2694:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2695:     ok.
 2696: 
 2697: wait_message_range(P, Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2698:     wait_message_range(P, Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2699: 
 2700: wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2701:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Client),
 2702:     Messages = respond_messages(Result),
 2703:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2704:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2705:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2706:     try
 2707:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2708:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2709:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2710:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2711:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2712:         ok
 2713:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2714:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2715:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2716:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2717:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2718:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2719:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2720:     end.
 2721: 
 2722: 
 2723: wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2724:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2725:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2726:     ?assert_equal([], respond_messages(Result)),
 2727:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2728:     try
 2729:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2730:         ok
 2731:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2732:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2733:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2734:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2735:     end.
 2736: 
 2737: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2738:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2739:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2740:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2741:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2742:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2743:     end.
 2744: 
 2745: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2746:     random:seed(now()),
 2747:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2748:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2749:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2750:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2751:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2752:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2753:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2754:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2755:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2756:     AllUsers = [{Domain, <<"alice">>}, {Domain, <<"bob">>}, {Domain, <<"carol">>}],
 2757:     wait_for_msgs(Msgs, AllUsers),
 2758: 
 2759:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2760: 
 2761: %% Wait for messages to be written
 2762: wait_for_msgs(Msgs, Users) ->
 2763:     UsersCnt = [{S, U, count_msgs(Msgs, S, U)} || {S, U} <- Users],
 2764:     [wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(S, U, 10, C) || {S, U, C} <- UsersCnt],
 2765:     ok.
 2766: 
 2767: count_msgs(Msgs, S, U) ->
 2768:     Bin = <<U/binary, "@", S/binary>>,
 2769:     length([1 ||
 2770:             {_,
 2771:              {FromBin, _FromJID, _FromArcID},
 2772:              {ToBin, _ToJID, _ToArcID}, _, _Packet} <- Msgs,
 2773:            FromBin =:= Bin orelse ToBin =:= Bin]).
 2774: 
 2775: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2776:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2777:         ID1 =< ID2
 2778:     end,
 2779:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2780: 
 2781: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2782:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2783:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2784:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2785:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2786:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2787: 
 2788: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2789:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2790: 
 2791:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2792:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2793: 
 2794: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2795:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2796:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2797:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2798:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2799:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2800:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2801:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2802: 
 2803: random_time() ->
 2804:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2805:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2806:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2807: 
 2808: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2809:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2810:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2811:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2812:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2813: 
 2814: 
 2815: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2816:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2817: 
 2818: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2819:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2820:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2821:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2822:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2823:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2824:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2825: 
 2826: archive_message(Args) ->
 2827:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2828: 
 2829: 
 2830: 
 2831: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2832:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2833: 
 2834:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2835:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2836:     R = room_address(Room),
 2837: 
 2838:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2839:     Host = host(),
 2840:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2841:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2842:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2843:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2844:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2845:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2846:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2847:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2848: 
 2849:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2850: 
 2851:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2852: 
 2853:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2854: 
 2855: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2856:     Host = host(),
 2857:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2858: 
 2859: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2860:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2861:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2862:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2863:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2864: 
 2865: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2866: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2867:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2868:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2869: 
 2870: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2871:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2872: 
 2873: 
 2874: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2875:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2876: 
 2877: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2878:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2879:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2880:         Other ->
 2881:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2882:             false
 2883:     end.
 2884: 
 2885: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2886:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2887:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2888:             true;
 2889:         _ ->
 2890:             false
 2891:     end.
 2892: 
 2893: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2894:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2895: 
 2896: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2897:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2898:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2899:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2900:     Client.
 2901: 
 2902: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2903:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2904:         undefined ->
 2905:             ok;
 2906:         Value ->
 2907:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2908:     end.
 2909: 
 2910: 
 2911: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2912: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2913: %%
 2914: %% Messages:
 2915: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2916: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2917: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2918: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2919: %%
 2920: %% Each tuple is
 2921: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2922: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2923: prefs_cases2() ->
 2924:     [
 2925:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2926:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2927:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2928:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2929:  
 2930:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2931:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2932:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2933:  
 2934:  
 2935:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2936:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2937:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2938:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2939:  
 2940:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2941:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2942:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2943:  
 2944:  
 2945:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2946:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2947:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2948:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2949:  
 2950:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2951:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2952:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2953:     ].
 2954: 
 2955: %% First write all messages, than read and check
 2956: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2957:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2958:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2959:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2960:         %% Just send messages for each prefs configuration
 2961:         Funs = [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()],
 2962: 
 2963:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2964: 
 2965:         %% Get ALL messages using several queries if required
 2966:         Stanzas = get_all_messages(P, Alice),
 2967:         ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2968:         Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2969: 
 2970:         %% Check messages, print out all failed cases
 2971:         Fails = lists:append([Fun(Bodies) || Fun <- Funs]),
 2972:         %% If fails consult with ct:pal/2 why
 2973:         ?assert_equal([], Fails)
 2974:         end,
 2975:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2976: 
 2977: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2978:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2979:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2980:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2981: 
 2982:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2983:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2984:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2985: 
 2986:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2987:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2988:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2989: 
 2990:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2991:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2992:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2993:         ok.
 2994: 
 2995: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2996:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2997:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2998:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2999:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 3000:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 3001:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 3002:     %% Messages:
 3003:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 3004:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 3005:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 3006:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 3007:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 3008:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 3009:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 3010:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 3011:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 3012:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 3013:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 3014:     %% Delay check
 3015:     fun(Bodies) ->
 3016:         ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 3017:         ?_assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 3018:                              [{prefs_state, PrefsState}])
 3019:     end.
 3020: 
 3021: get_last_four_messages(P, Alice) ->
 3022:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 3023:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 3024:     respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)).
 3025: 
 3026: get_all_messages(P, Alice) ->
 3027:     get_all_messages(P, Alice, undefined).
 3028: 
 3029: get_all_messages(P, Alice, Id) ->
 3030:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=50, direction='after', id=Id},
 3031:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"page_rsm">>, RSM)),
 3032:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 3033:     PageMessages = respond_messages(Result),
 3034:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 3035:     #result_iq{last=LastId} = ParsedIQ,
 3036:     case PageMessages of
 3037:         [] ->
 3038:             [];
 3039:         [_|_] ->
 3040:             PageMessages ++ get_all_messages(P, Alice, LastId)
 3041:     end.
 3042: 
 3043: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 3044:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 3045:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 3046:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 3047:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 3048: 
 3049: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 3050:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 3051: 
 3052: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 3053:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 3054:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 3055:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 3056: 
 3057: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 3058: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 3059:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 3060:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3061:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 3062:         end,
 3063:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3064: 
 3065: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 3066: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 3067:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 3068:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 3069:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 3070: 
 3071:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 3072:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3073: 
 3074:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 3075:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 3076:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 3077:     ok.
 3078: 
 3079: maybe_binary_to_integer(B) when is_binary(B) ->
 3080:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(B));
 3081: maybe_binary_to_integer(undefined) ->
 3082:     undefined.
 3083: 
 3084: add_nostore_hint(#xmlel{children=Children}=Elem) ->
 3085:     Elem#xmlel{children=Children ++ [nostore_hint_elem()]}.
 3086: 
 3087: nostore_hint_elem() ->
 3088:     #xmlel{name = <<"no-store">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:hints">>}]}.
 3089: 
 3090: has_x_user_element(ArcMsg) ->
 3091:     ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 3092:     ParsedMess#forwarded_message.has_x_user_element.
